action.title: Mashle
action.description: This is a world of magic where magic is used for everything. But deep in the forest exists a young man who spends his time training.

action.title: Demon Slayer
action.description: Tanjiro's journey to the Swordsmith Village to reunite with two Hashira, Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito and Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji.

action.title: Vinland Saga
action.description: Einar, a young man from northern England, lives with his mother and younger sister in a peaceful farming village.

action.title: Suzume
action.description: The film follows 17-year-old high school student Suzume Iwato and Souta Munakata, to prevent a series of disasters across Japan.

action.title: Oshi no Ko
action.description: Oshi No Ko is a supernatural mystery set within the entertainment and idol industry, Vivy tells the story of an AI songstress.

action.title: Watt's Up, Girl?
action.description: Suddenly, the electrical appliance becomes a girl. Since then, his stable and boring life has been full of waves and laughter.

action.title: Dr.STONE
action.description: Awakened into a world where humanity has been petrified, scientific genius Senku and his brawny friend Taiju.
